Title: Relates to establishing the New York city public housing preservation trust and providing for the issuance of certain bonds of the New York city housing development corporation
Summary: Relates to establishing the New York city public housing preservation trust for properties owned or operated by the New York city housing authority and providing for the issuance of certain bonds of the New York city housing development corporation.
LawCode: Add Art 14 §§600 - 625, Pub Hous L; amd §§13-101 & 13-133, NYC Ad Cd
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the public housing law and the administrative code of the city of New York, in relation to establishing the New York city public housing preservation trust for properties owned or operated by the New York city housing authority and providing for the issuance of certain bonds of the New York city housing development corporation
